physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mildly icteric sclera, mild discomfort on deep abdominal palpation, no masses or organomegaly.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Hemoglobin level decreased to 70 g/L and lactate dehydrogenase level increased to 3450 U/L on follow-up.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Marked improvement in energy level, no further episodes of hemolytic episodes, esophageal spasm resolved, erectile dysfunction resolved.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms improved significantly after starting eculizumab therapy; no further hemolytic episodes were reported.
